li.label: Blackout
li.description: I suddenly forgot everything, that's not good.

li.label: A nightmare is happening
li.description: First an eclipse an now this! when is this nightmare going to end.

li.label: Survived a meteor apocalypse
li.description: I looked at death itself, good thing I'm still here.

li.label: I could go home.
li.description: The feeling that you can go home after having experienced so much is tantalizing, but I just can't leave this planet. This place is now my home.

li.label: I looked at a meteor shower.
li.description: The cosmos, still so beautiful even after abandoning me here.

li.label: Experienced a traumatic phenomenon
li.description: Everything went black for a few seconds, and most colonists were down on their knees, my head hurts like hell.
